deals.title: Mango Lassi
deals.itemDescription: Mango lassi is a delicious and creamy Indian beverage made by blending ripe mangoes with yogurt, milk, sugar, and a touch of saffron. It's a refreshing and sweet drink that combines the natural sweetness of mangoes with the tanginess of yogurt, resulting in a smooth and tropical-flavored treat.

itemDescriptionBadge.text: Mango lassi is a delicious and creamy Indian beverage made by blending ripe mangoes with yogurt, milk, sugar, and a touch of saffron. It's a refreshing and sweet drink that combines the natural sweetness of mangoes with the tanginess of yogurt, resulting in a smooth and tropical-flavored treat.
itemDescriptionBadge.textFormat: Mango lassi is a delicious and creamy Indian beverage made by blending ripe mangoes with yogurt, milk, sugar, and a touch of saffron. It's a refreshing and sweet drink that combines the natural sweetness of mangoes with the tanginess of yogurt, resulting in a smooth and tropical-flavored treat.

deals.title: CHICKEN CALIFORNIA
deals.itemDescription: Our Chicken California Cheesesteak features grilled all-white meat chicken and melted provolone cheese, topped with ranch dressing and served on our signature toasted roll. This cheesesteak comes with lettuce, tomato, mayo, and pickle.

deals.title: CHICKEN PHILLY
deals.itemDescription: Our Chicken Philly Cheesesteak is made with all-white meat chicken, grilled green peppers, onions, and mushrooms topped with melted provolone cheese and served on our signature toasted roll. This cheesesteak comes with lettuce, tomato, mayo, and pickle.

deals.title: CHICKEN TERIYAKI
deals.itemDescription: The Chicken Teriyaki Cheesesteak comes with grilled all-white meat chicken and onions topped with teriyaki sauce and melted Swiss cheese, served on our signature toasted roll. This cheesesteak comes with lettuce, tomato, mayo, and pickle.

deals.title: CHICKEN BUFFALO
deals.itemDescription: Our Chicken Buffalo Cheesesteak features all natural white meat chicken grilled with spicy buffalo sauce, onions, and banana peppers, topped with melted provolone cheese, and  served on our signature toasted roll. This cheesesteak comes with lettuce, tomato, mayo, and pickle.
